# 本周学习的知识分享
```plain
import gmpy2 as gp
import binascii

lcm = 
c = 
N = 
e = 65537
k = 1

while True:
    if gp.gcd(e,k*lcm) == 1:
        break
    k += 1

phi = k*lcm
d = gp.invert(e,phi)
m = pow(c,d,N)
print(binascii.unhexlify(hex(m)[2:]))
```

NSSCTF{h3ll0_wo21d!}

###  [UTCTF 2020]basics  
打开是一个二进制的文本内容，将其转化为ascii码，得到

![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2025/png/49639454/1739107621972-9678e1ca-13dc-4f6d-980c-84c4ffef1b68.png)

根据第一段内容为BASE 64，解密得到

![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2025/png/49639454/1739107632208-c7de458e-2772-4888-96b5-e9b0ef01f7c2.png)

再用凯撒密码解密，得到

![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2025/png/49639454/1739107657455-b4209805-4644-43f7-a583-239d167ca8c4.png)

最后字频分析，得到

![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2025/png/49639454/1739107834735-982114f4-14f4-48c2-8d25-c1a52ba485a9.png)

NSSCTF{n0w_th4ts_wh4t_i_c4ll_crypt0}

###  [HGAME 2022 week3]RSA attack 3

```plain
from RSAwienerHacker import *
import libnum

n = 
e = 
c = 

d=hack_RSA(e,n)
flag=pow(c,d,n)
print(libnum.n2s(flag))
```
